divs: Sighting DetailsThis is further to my previous report. I wanted to add that the first object seen was about magnitude 0 or brighter. Through 15x70 binoculars only the bright orange light could be seen. It did not change in brightness like a light which is aimed might be expected to do. It moved slowly, like a satellite. The second object, trailing the station, was not observed with aid. Possibly, it was not related to the first object, but it was quite a coincidence.
Summary: Object following space station - more information.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bridgeport
There was one other sighting in Bridgeport on or around July 24th 2009
